question:
You have seen a job advertised in the newspaper. You want to apply for the job.
Write a letter to the manager of the company. 

In your letter
• provide information about yourself
• give details of your previous work experience
• say why the company should consider you for the job
text: I'm writing this letter to apply for the position of Business Analyst in your organization. I'm applying after coming across your advertisement in the newspaper, Times of India  dated 15th March,
2020.  I have over 8 years of experience as a business analyst in the healthcare domain and I feel that my profile would be an ideal fit for the role you are recruiting for.

In my current organization, I play the role of a Functional Manager, responsible for providing functional and business expertise for building the core product of our organization. My daily activities include liaising with the clients to understand and capture the requirements of the product, discuss the design with the development team and work closely with the management about product roadmap and weekly task planning.

As you can infer from my daily activities, the role I currently perform meets all your requirements mentioned in the advertisement. I also would expand on my current capabilities, if there is a need for that in your company.
I hope to hear from you in the near future.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase product roadmap seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
